name: Good Boi
description:
Meet Good Boi.
He needs all of your attention. All of the time.
He is literally the cutest.
He loves you so much it hurts.

Good Boi: the puppy you always wanted.

Made by @realriker with Unity and Clayxels, with music by Kevin MacLeod

If you enjoyed your time with Good Boi,
please leave a comment 🖤🤍🖤.
